stylesForPage: .icon-p2 a { display: grid; grid-template-columns: 1fr 3fr; grid-gap: 100px; text-decoration: none; margin: 50px 0; }
.icon-p2 i { background-color: var(--color-red); color: white; padding: 55px; width: 200px; height: 200px; border-radius: 50%; display: inline-flex; place-content: center; font-size: .6em; }
.icon-p2 .title-p2 { display: flex; place-content: center; flex-direction: column; }
.icon-p2 .triangle-p2 { background-color: var(--color-red); width: 50px; height: 50px; z-index: -1; transform: rotate(45deg); position: absolute; left: 280px; top: 120px; }

.icon-p2 .content-p2 { background-color: var(--color-red); padding: 20px 30px; font-size: .3em; border-radius: 30px; height: 150px; width: 600px; text-transform: uppercase; font-family: sans-serif; color: white; }
.div-p2 { display: grid; grid-gap: 10px; grid-template-columns: 1fr 5fr; text-decoration: none; color: white; margin: 10px 0; }
.i-p2 { background-color: var(--color-red); padding: 10px; width: 40px; height: 40px; display: flex; place-content: center; border-radius: 50%; line-height: 1.2; font-size: 1.2em; }

.p-p2 { background-color: var(--color-red);  margin: 0; display: flex; place-content: center; line-height: 1.2; border-radius: 10px; color: white; padding: 6px; text-transform: UPPERCASE; font-size: .7em; text-align: center; }
